Post.title: arch
Post._content:
### xorg
sudo pacman -S xorg-server xorg-apps xorg-xinit xorg-xclock xterm 

### kde plasma
sudo pacman -S plasma
sudo pacman -S kde-applications

### 
sddm: simple desktop display manager

sudo pacman -S sddm
sudo systemctl enable sddm
sudo systemctl start sddm


X.
X11R6  XRelease 6


twm
TabWindow Manager for the X WindowSystem. 


sTerm, Rxvt, Konsole, Kvt, Gnome-Terminal, Nxterm, eterm



xrdp



run level [inittab](https://blog.csdn.net/newnewman80/article/details/8133797)
0 -  | shutdown.target
1 -  | rescue.target
2 - , NFS | multi-user.target
3 -  | multi-user.target
4 -  | multi-user.target
5 - X11() | graphical.target
6 -  | reboot.target


### systemd
http://blog.itpub.net/31524109/viewspace-2647049/


Display manager: https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Display_manager_(%E7%AE%80%E4%BD%93%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87)




dwm
https://blog.csdn.net/qq_45933858/article/details/124553077

kde

DM: https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Display_manager_(%E7%AE%80%E4%BD%93%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87)
DM, 
SDDM - Simple Desktop Display Manager
DM https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_36073714/article/details/116758417
WM(Window Manager)

Post.title: git
Post._content:
## Merge
git merge --abort


## commit
```
# commitbase
git merge-base $branch1 $branch2 

# commitbase
git show-branch --merge-base $branch1 $branch2 
```

## cherry-pick

- 
```
git cherry-pick <commitHash>/<branch>
```
- 
```
git cherry-pick <HashA> <HashB>
git cherry-pick A..B # A
git cherry-pick A^..B # A
```
## rebase

```sh
git rebase [startpoint] [endpoint] --onto [branchname]
```

# Ref
https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/75499871
https://www.jianshu.com/p/4a8f4af4e803
Post.raw:
---
layout: title
title: git
date: 2022-10-17 14:48:01
tags: git,code
---

## Merge
git merge --abort


## commit
```
# commitbase
git merge-base $branch1 $branch2 

# commitbase
git show-branch --merge-base $branch1 $branch2 
```

## cherry-pick

- 
```
git cherry-pick <commitHash>/<branch>
```
- 
```
git cherry-pick <HashA> <HashB>
git cherry-pick A..B # A
git cherry-pick A^..B # A
```
## rebase

```sh
git rebase [startpoint] [endpoint] --onto [branchname]
```

# Ref
https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/75499871
https://www.jianshu.com/p/4a8f4af4e803

Post.title: Xaas
Post._content:
Iaas: Infrastructure as a Service
Paas: Platform as a Service
Saas: Software as a Service

Baas: Backend as a Service ()
Faas: Function as a Service ()

Daas: Data as a Service
Naas: Network as a Service
Post.raw:
---
title: Xaas
date: 2022-11-05 16:11:15
tags:
---

Iaas: Infrastructure as a Service
Paas: Platform as a Service
Saas: Software as a Service

Baas: Backend as a Service ()
Faas: Function as a Service ()

Daas: Data as a Service
Naas: Network as a Service
Post.content:
Iaas: Infrastructure as a Service
Paas: Platform as a Service
Saas: Software as a Service

Baas: Backend as a Service ()
